Class MusicParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • MusicParams

  • public final class MusicParams
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the musical parameters of the system.
    Author:
    braem

    • Method Detail

      • isValidParameters

        public static boolean isValidParameters()
        Verifies that the parameters set here are valid.
        Returns:
        true if parameters are valid. false otherwise.

      • checkProbability

        private static boolean checkProbability(double[] probs)
        Checks whether all numbers in prob sum to 1. Uses an error of 0.000001 when equating the sum to 1.
        Parameters:
        probs - Array of probabilities.
        Returns:
        true if probabilities sum to 1. false otherwise.
